jodd.mail

Class MailAddress

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.mail.MailAddress

  • public class MailAddress
extends java.lang.Object
    Storage for personal name and email address. Serves as a email address adapter between various formats.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static MailAddress[] EMPTY_ARRAY 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MailAddress(javax.mail.Address address)
      Creates new email address from Address.
      MailAddress(EmailAddress emailAddress)
      Creates new email address from EmailAddress.
      MailAddress(javax.mail.internet.InternetAddress internetAddress)
      Creates new email address from InternetAddress.
      MailAddress(java.lang.String address)
      Creates new address by specifying one of the following: "foo@bar.com" - only email address.
      MailAddress(java.lang.String personalName, java.lang.String email)
      Creates new address by specifying email and personal name.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static MailAddress[] createFrom(javax.mail.Address[] addresses)
      Converts array of Address to MailAddress.
      static MailAddress[] createFrom(EmailAddress[] addresses)
      Converts array of EmailAddress to MailAddress.
      static MailAddress[] createFrom(java.lang.String[] addresses)
      Converts array of String to MailAddress.
      java.lang.String getEmail()
      Returns email address.
      java.lang.String getPersonalName()
      Returns personal name, may be null.
      EmailAddress toEmailAddress()
      Creates new EmailAddress.
      javax.mail.internet.InternetAddress toInternetAddress()
      Creates new InternetAddress from current data.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns string representation of this email.

        public static final MailAddress[] EMPTY_ARRAY

    • Constructor Detail

      • MailAddress

        public MailAddress(java.lang.String personalName,
                   java.lang.String email)
        Creates new address by specifying email and personal name.

      • MailAddress

        public MailAddress(java.lang.String address)
        Creates new address by specifying one of the following:
        • "foo@bar.com" - only email address.
        • "Jenny Doe <foo@bar.com>" - first part of the string is personal name, and the other part is email, surrounded with < and >.

      • MailAddress

        public MailAddress(EmailAddress emailAddress)
        Creates new email address from EmailAddress.

      • MailAddress

        public MailAddress(javax.mail.internet.InternetAddress internetAddress)
        Creates new email address from InternetAddress.

      • MailAddress

        public MailAddress(javax.mail.Address address)
        Creates new email address from Address.

        Creates new EmailAddress.
